reviews.review: The best game I have ever played nice people (mainly)
Bots are annoying, but until valve integrates vacnet in the heavy update coming this fall, we will just have to use faceit for the time being

En pocas palabras, team fortress 2 es un juego que ha logrado equilibrar muy bien a todos los mercenarios de esta fabulosa entrega de Valve. Pero porque pienso que es un buen juego?
1. No necesitas un ordenador muy potente para jugar, ya que el requerimiento de la memoria RAM i la capacidad de almacenaje es muy baja.
2. Todas las clases de Team Fortress 2 son muy variadas y al mismo tiempo, equilibradas, pienso que es uno de los mejores juegos que ha conseguido que cada uno de los personajes, tenga el mismo número de puntos fuertes y defectos ante todos los demás. No hay un personaje muy flojo o demasiado fuerte.
3. Gran variedad de mapas en cada uno de los modos de juego. Tu tienes el poder de decidir en que mapa quieres jugar, que modo de juego quieres jugar, quien quieres ser y con quien quieres estar, antes de entrar en tu partida.
4. Sombreros y bailes!
5. No sé que tiene este juego, pero tú puedes decidir si tener una partida tranquila (Capture the Flag) o una partida más movida (Mountain KIng) para poder disfrutar de este juego a tu manera.
El único punto débil del juego que encuentro, es que el juego no se ha actualizado desde hace bastante tiempo, ni tampoco se han adecuado los gráficos a la actualidad.
En definitiva, un gran clásico que puedes disfrutar día tras día sin aburrirte!

Now with One Thousand Hours in this game, I feel it's time to write my review. This game has gotten me through some hard times, mainly through the community. I have made a majority of steam friends through TF2. I love this game, its community, everything. The Team Fortress 2 Community hasn't fallen yet, and it never will. This game may be going through a large bot crisis now, but we're still going strong and the crisis seems to be dying down. We may not have had any updates in the past 3 years, but we're still hoping for one. This game is a timeless masterpiece, which cannot die. All I have to say about this game is that it's truly amazing. Thank you, TF2, thank you for everything.

Truly the grandfather for most team FPS shooters.

Игра хороша, но постепенно гниёт. Если разработчики не поправят ситуацию, то в скором времени играть станет невозможно. Супер динамичная игра с 9 классами, где игра за каждого даёт примерно один и тот же результат - уничтожение вражеской команды. Много режимов, однако актуальны лишь несколько. Отличная творческая база и богатая мастерская.
Сыграл пару каток, получилось неплохо, только не понял куда 5 лет жизни просрал.
Un juego entretenido con una gran comunidad,en donde puedes incluso conocer gente nueva y nuevos amigos.
Игра супер! Поиграйте кто ещё не играл, стоит своего времени) Тем более бесплатно)

I have an extremely love/hate relationship with this game. at its best this game is untouchable and is by far my favorite fps game, but at its worst it can be a frustrating and slow game with infuriating mechanics. I have a million thing to say but I will try to keep it short (this will mostly be negative but I do love this game). let's just get right into my main problem, your enjoyment of the game depends entirely on whether the people you are playing with are assholes or not. this game is filled with weapons that can completely ruin any fun you are having ex: engineer is a great and unique class and is a great way to mix up the way you play this game but on a map like harvest he can completely ruin the match simply by placing a sentry and turtling since it takes a large amount of coordination to destroy a well placed sentry but in a casual match teamwork doesn't exist so you are forced to ether stay away from the objective and wait for your team to get lucky or you can charge in and die over and over without even leaving a dent, by the way did I mention how even with my current 640 hours in tf2 I win about 80% of my 1v1 interactions but a engineer that just installed the game and can't aim can kill you/force you to switch classes simply by placing a sentry. i would say that 40% of this games skill is utilizing your movement to avoid shots but as soon as an engineers arrives you are forced to stop having fun so that you can hide behind a wall and shoot it from a distance (which wont work 90% of the time)  

tldr: at its best this game is a masterpiece (even if you are doing bad you will still be having fun) but at as soon as some asshole pick's engineer on harvest you might as well just leave the server and play 2fort because thats better than fighting a harvest engineer

sorry that this is a mess but i don't think that complaining about f2p engineers is worth more then 10 minutes of my time
